Game.Name: Rocket Power - Zero Gravity Zone (USA)
Game.plot: If you crave extreme sports action, then join Otto, Twister, Reggie, and Sam as they test their skills in the skatepark. Rocket Power: Zero Gravity Zone lets you play as all four members from Team Rocket Power plus one unlockable character. Test your skills in a variety of gameplay modes, including free skate, career, and multiplayer. Special power-ups, which you can find throughout eight different environments, help you perform more tricks and enhance your character's skills.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/917831.htmlCheat: Misc. PasswordsEnter the following at the password screen:
Game.Notes: Rocket Power: Zero Gravity is based on the Nickelodeon show of the same name, and features 12 environments for characters Otto, Reggie, Twister, and Sam to skate through.
